subsystems_found.name: Core Agent Logic
subsystems_found.summary: These files form the core logic of the agent, including CLI entry points and tool integrations.

subsystems_found.name: Debug Utilities
subsystems_found.summary: A subsystem dedicated to debugging aids with both internal tests and operational checks.

subsystems_found.name: Provider Services
subsystems_found.summary: This handles the communication layer between the agent and its service providers, including token management.

subsystems_found.name: Self-Improvement Features
subsystems_found.summary: Focused on capabilities that enhance or expand the agent's functionality over time.

improvement_opportunities.description: Implement more sophisticated security practices such as request-signing before sending to external APIs.
Lack of tests seems evident; should include test files covering different execution scenarios and edge cases.
Considering refactoring or better organization within the sandbox for experimental code, moving towards a more structured approach.
Enhancing user experience would mean adding more command-line options as well as cleaner and more informative error messages.
